text: Tried the porridge here and was pleasantly surprised—served in a claypot, it was nice, tasty, and comforting. The shop is small but cozy, with an atmosphere that's simple yet welcoming. Service was friendly and efficient. A great spot for a satisfying porridge fix!

I recently dined at the Hougang 1 branch, and I must say I was very impressed by the quality at this small branch. The food was well/prepared, whether I chose to dine in or take away. Dishes I enjoyed here are horfun, fried rice and their scrambled eggs rice bowls. The service was equally good; the staff were quick, attentive, and genuinely friendly, especially Joanne Chin who took the time to check on every customers’ needs. Her attention to detail and warm demeanor made me feel valued as a customer.

Food is always good, i live nearby & the quality no matter dine in or delivery is consistent •ᴗ•

the place is rather small, but my folks & i love coming down here to have a cozy dinner/meal whenever we dont feel like cooking. the aunties here have also grown to recognise us, it’s nice to relive the kampung spirit in this heartland once in a while!

recommendations:
- XO fried rice
- Prawn paste chicken
- seafood Claypot rice

Joanne, the staff at Hougang 1 Mall is very accommodating and she's very service orientated. I really enjoyed and like th way she service mi despite I'm doing a take away for the second time. Thumbs up. Hope every service staff will serve like how she did.
Overall good was nice. We ordered the tofu, XO vegetable and olive fried rice. The fried rice is a little oily but can request for less oil and salt. Overall service is good
